Maximum Base level is now 130
All Class exclusive Mounts
New Town "Lighthalzen"
New Class "Super Novice"
New Instance "Thanatos Tower"
New Feature "Runes System" "Homeland system"
New series of misssion "Singra Master Box"
Fix certain BUG
Optimized for in-game translations, and some in-game features

New Race - Doram

New Map - Rachel

New Dungeon - Cake Battle

Game Optimizations

EP7.0 “Luoyang” is available now! Protect the Origin, evolve to a new era!

The 4th-job Ascendancy is available to all 15 classes

The first China Style Map, “Luoyang”

New Dungeon “Echoing Corridor”

New Map “Wasteland”

Bug Fix

Optimized support for devices with iOS 12 and lowe

1. 4th-job Rune is now available

2. New Headwear items for 4th-job ascendancy

3. New collectable item

4. Wasteland World MVP——Dragon Skeleton

5. Brand New Mercenary Cat System

6. "Optimized the crashing issue for certain devices

7. Fixed the certain bugs in the game"

1. 4th-job Rune is now available

2. New Headwear items for 4th-job ascendancy

3. New collectable item

4. Wasteland World MVP——Dragon Skeleton

5. Brand New Mercenary Cat System

6. "Optimized the crashing issue for certain devices

7. Fixed the certain bugs in the game"

EP 7.5 [Moon's Echo] begins. Follow Fate's new guidance. Look for Traces of Rainbow Light!

-New map [Moon Lake]
In a faraway galaxy, the moon lingered alone outside Yggdrasill. New map [Moon Lake] is released. Follow the Goddess of Fate's guidance to find out the secrets of the Rainbow Bridge and the New Continent…

-Server Grand Event [Rainbow Fall]
Rainbow shards have fallen to the Continent of Midgard and the reason remains unclear… Join other adventurers across the server to search for the truth and solve this crisis!

-New 12V12 Competition [Holy Ground War]
Underneath Raahe the subterranean flow is turbulent. The war between the Dove Faction and Hawk Faction has escalated once again! New 12V12 Competition gameplay mode [Holy Ground War] is released. Fight for resources, attack the enemy and defend your tower lines. Are yours the strongest team?

-[Full Angle Vision] unlocked
Say goodbye to the fixed viewing angle in the past. Our new 360-degree viewing angle provides you with complete freedom and more details during adventures in this different new world!

Version 2.0 "Glorious Domain" is launched!

- New Map: Eclage
- New Class: Ninja
- New Server and Newbie Academy
- New Instance Dungeon: Palace of Beauty
- New Special Crossover Event: Slayers Premium

Version 2.0 "Glorious Domain" is launched!
- New Map: Eclage
- New Class: Ninja
- New Server and Newbie Academy
- New Instance Dungeon: Palace of Beauty

New adventures coming to the Isle of Dreams on 23 August - Summer Dream Party!

- New job class, Gunslinger, bringing their rebellion and their superb marksmanship
- New map Comodo, a beachside sunset waterscape dotted with magnificent fireworks.
- New dungeon Ponape Museum Island. Uncover the cause of the weird incident
